column4: why would it be ethically unsound to include Java in your distro?
it's non-free
there are free versions that Ubuntu should include. Java is too powerful to be disincluded from a distrobution.
personally, i agree. but complain to Sun. the apache foundation seeks to change all that, with a GPL'd distribution of java
if you want that install Mepis or Xandros. their KDE suites do support X configuration from the desktop
I am able to edit configuration files but I thought my programming skills could possibly be used for usability purposes.
where do you teach Linux at?
i teach game development at various instutitions throughout Europe
awesome. I was hoping for an approach closer to grade school so I could obtain advice but cool none the less.
right. you want to get into game development?
I want to teach Linux. I feel there are many people that can benefit from it but are scared.
I feel that students today are becoming less educated than my generation with computers. They learn one set of software instead of how to use a computer.
game development has great payoff. i teach only FOSS game development, which is a big, yet new area many institutions are exploring
That is great! Do you guys have anything available to the public to play with? That is very respectful of you to do that.
see wmi.modprobe.de
do you mean games?
Yup! Teaching in its self is a very respectiful position in my eyes.
my students here in denmark have made a bunch of games. i'll be uploading a few soon enough.
good for you.
unfortunatly for us, there's not really an alternative for Cedega other than windows.
don't get me wrong. i understand ;) the more money that goes to Cedega the less native Linux games we have. interesting there's nothing like it for Apple, and of course Windows.
I guess its still 'write to my devs and gripe'. Too bad EA is taking over all my favorites. when they destroyed Westwood, I was quite irate.
they really do represent the death of a great many startup and medium sized dev companies.
Do you think that you will be able to put out developers that would be able to help give better Linux games so that cedegla would be useless for Ubuntu and other distros?
